    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes Employee

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Employee

      • Description

        Employment identification; using an employee ID number, title, level within the company, and an indication of their status (e.g., active, retired, on leave, or terminated from employment).  Additional information about an employee can be entered into the element, including the name of the employee, if it differs from the person name identified as a customer or contact.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Employee description="Example String Value" employer="Example String Value" id="employee_1" level="Example String Value" status="Active" title="Example String Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Employee" : {
    "value" : null,
    "id" : "employee_1",
    "level" : "Example String Value",
    "title" : "Example String Value",
    "status" : "Active",
    "description" : "Example String Value",
    "employer" : "Example String Value"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        id
        Identifier assigned to the employee.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:ID
        Example Value employee_1
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        level
        Level in employer organization (e.g. seniority) that coveys privileges.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        title
        Title of employee in the employer company that conveys rank or privileges.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        status
        Status of employment.
        Details
        Type EmployeeStatus_Enum
        Example Value Active
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        description
        Description of the staff tour code.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        employer
        The airlineThe empoyer to which the EmployeeID is associated.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
